replies.msg:
Some people think stricter punishment for driving offenders is the only effective way to improve safety on the road. To what extent do you agree or disagree.

Road safety have always been a great concern towards the public. Some people believe that implementing heavier punishment is the only solution. Admittedly, more serious penalty is more deterrent to lawbreakers but there are many ways which improve road safety like safety promotion, education and the advancement of traffic control and surveillance systems.

Promotions and education are always a better choice to prevent accidents. There is a driving license test which people must pass before being a driver. Candidates are required to get driving lessons in order to understand traffic systems and the circumstances which are allowed to drive. For example, ten years ago, there were many road accidents because of driving after drinking alcohol. The government carried out numerous measures to tackle the issue including advertising on television, setting up enforcement actions and increasing the period of jail sentence and the amount of fine. Everyday, the advertisements spread the danger of driving after drinking or taking drugs and remain drivers the seriousness of careless driving. Back to today, the number of crimes due to careless driving reduce significantly.

Better traffic control and surveillance systems help to enhance road safety. Actually, many traffic casualties occur at which traffic lights or zebra crossings have not been set up. There is still a lot of room to make improvements such as establishing footbridge systems at black sites. Hence, pedestrians would easily and conveniently access to a safer route to their destinations.

A stiff punishment may have deferent effects but other precautions are as important as sentencing. Those suggestions can be carried out at the same time to achieve the best improvement of road safety.

277 words

replies.msg:
落筆前先諗下題目問乜，然後係你嘅立場係乜，之後就係支持你論點嘅理據係乜
呢條題目嘅重點字眼係only effective way, 你選擇嘅立場係不同意stricter punishment係唯一方法，因為其他方法都一樣有用
建議嘅flow：先寫同意stricter punishment有用（with reasons) ，再寫道路意外除咗司機知法犯法仲有咩原因？有咩其他方法都work

睇番你篇文：
- 敢問你提driving license test 係想support 你咩論點？揸得車嘅全部都pass test咗有license.
- 政府有關酒後駕駛嘅ad 點解work? 係因為酒駕嘅increasing sentence and fine (stricter punishment), 定因為educate 到司機酒駕嘅危險性？
其實主要問題都係喺第二段

其實最簡單咁樣分段
intro+stance
reason 1
reason 2
reason 3
conclusion
睇落都有條理好多啦
